column3: Well I'm so above you,, it is plain to see
column4: But I came to love you anyway
column5: So you pulled my heart out
column7: Any old time you keep me waiting,, waiting,, waiting
column10: Oh,, oh,, oh,, oh,, I got a love that keeps me waiting
column14: Well your mama kept you but your daddy left you
column15: And I should have done you just the same
column16: But I came to love you
column17: And I want to believe you
column18: Any old time you keep me waiting,, waiting,, waiting
column21: Oh,, I got a girl that keeps waiting
